title: FS: PSA 3.5 Warhop & SGC 2 Ritter Polar Bear ***SOLD***
author: Scott L.

posts.post_title: FS: PSA 3.5 Warhop & SGC 2 Ritter Polar Bear ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me and delivered. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

PSA 3.5 Warhop $115. A SGC 4 just did $140 on eBay. Super nice card. New flip. 

SGC 2 Ritter with a clean Polar Bear back $75. 

Take both for $170. 

Thanks for looking!
